content: अर्वन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऋ-वनिप्] {@--1@} Going, moving, running. {@--2@} Mean, unworthy, censurable (गर्ह्य <ls>Uṇ. 4. 112</ls>; कुत्सित <ls n="Uṇ.">5. 54</ls>). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (अर्वा, अर्वंतौ, अर्वंतः &c.) {@--1@} A horse: श्लथीकृतप्रग्रहमर्वतां व्रजाः <ls>Śi. 12. 31.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of a horse or its driver. {@--3@} One of the ten horses of the moon. {@--4@} Indra. {@--5@} A short span (गोकर्णपरिमाण). --ती {@--1@} A mare. {@--2@} A bawd, procuress. {@--3@} A nymph.
